description: This tool converts a surface overlay on a sphere into spherical coordinates.

overlay_filename.title: Overlay Filename
overlay_filename.description: Full path to the overlay to map.

output_name.title: Output Name
output_name.description: Output file name. Can be full path to a .tif or .mgz file.

subjects_dir.title: Subjects Directory
subjects_dir.description: Set SUBJECTS_DIR. Default: uses environment variable.

coords.title: Overlay as Surface
coords.description: Treat overlay as a surface and write it into a 3 frame parameterization.

correlation_matrix.title: Correlation Matrix Label
correlation_matrix.description: Use the overlay to compute the correlation matrix within the specified label.

scale_factor.title: Scale Factor
scale_factor.description: Scale factor to adjust resolution of the spherical map.

verbose_vertex.title: Verbose Vertex Number
verbose_vertex.description: Invoke diagnostics for specified vertex number.
